name: Exista!
storyline:
Throughout the game, you will encounter a mysterious sign that warns against returning to certain areas. However, as your character matures, you revisit the sign with new skills, only to uncover more secrets and mysteries.

EXISTA! challenges you to explore the relationship between abilities and experience while reflecting on the consequences of your choices. Face challenges, develop skills, and discover the mysteries that await in this exciting and philosophical journey.
summary: EXISTA! offers a journey of a child through intriguing challenges and obstacles. In the role of the child, you must overcome obstacles using your natural abilities. As you progress, new skills are acquired, enabling you to face increasingly complex challenges.
